title: XSS touch.mail.ru compose Body

summaries.content: Browser specific DOM-based XSS in web mail for devices with touch interface.

user.name: Vladimir Dubrovin
user.bio: En la agostada senda he visto al buen lagarto (gota de cocodrilo) meditando.
